name: Vegan Swiss Meringue Buttercream Frosting
description: Vegan Swiss Meringue Buttercream Frosting! No need to cook sugar and eggs for this creamy, thick and irresistible frosting. It whips up like magic before your eyes, thanks to a secret ingredient!
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup (1 stick) vegan butter, slightly softened to room temperature*
2 cups powdered sugar (+ more as needed)
4 tablespoons aquafaba (liquid from a can of chickpeas)
Optional: vegan friendly food coloring, if desired

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vegan butter to a large bowl of a stand mixer with the whisk attachment (or you can use an electric hand mixer.) Beat the butter until creamy and smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vegan butter to a large bowl of a stand mixer with the whisk attachment (or you can use an electric hand mixer.) Beat the butter until creamy and smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the powdered sugar, 1/2 cup at a time so it doesn't jump out of the bowl, until all the powdered sugar is mixed in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the powdered sugar, 1/2 cup at a time so it doesn't jump out of the bowl, until all the powdered sugar is mixed in.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add the vanilla and aquafaba to the bowl, and beat on medium-high speed for 5 minutes. Don't cut the time short, it really does take that long to get perfectly creamy and silky smooth. If after 5 minutes the frosting is not thick enough, add more powdered sugar, 1/2 cup at a time, until the frosting is thick, fluffy and creamy.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add the vanilla and aquafaba to the bowl, and beat on medium-high speed for 5 minutes. Don't cut the time short, it really does take that long to get perfectly creamy and silky smooth. If after 5 minutes the frosting is not thick enough, add more powdered sugar, 1/2 cup at a time, until the frosting is thick, fluffy and creamy.

recipeInstructions.text: If adding color, mix in just a few drops of vegan friendly gel food coloring, or more until you have your desired color.
recipeInstructions.name: If adding color, mix in just a few drops of vegan friendly gel food coloring, or more until you have your desired color.

recipeInstructions.text: Use Swiss Meringue Buttercream to frost cupcakes, cakes or in between cookies. The recipe makes enough for about 12 cupcakes or a double layer cake.
recipeInstructions.name: Use Swiss Meringue Buttercream to frost cupcakes, cakes or in between cookies. The recipe makes enough for about 12 cupcakes or a double layer cake.

keywords: vegan buttercream, vegan swiss meringue buttercream
